projects.title: Monopoly Checker
projects.description: This app helps users keeping track of Monopoly tickets and their winning prize. It was built within 3 days. Technology: AngularJS, localStrage, JavaScript.

projects.title: Mini Trello
projects.description: Build a todo app in a day with Angular + Firebase with user email authentication. Tech: Angular, Firebase, Unit Testing, Jasmine, Grunt.

projects.title: Khmer Tube
projects.description: This single page application is built with Angular, JavaScript, Youtube API. The application targets Cambodian users who like to watch local news and entertainment.

projects.title: Google Keep Clone
projects.description: Google Keep Clone provides CRUD operations for note-taking. I used OOP PHP to build a web service supporting GET, POST, PUT, and UPDATE requests. For front end, I used Angular JS for tempting and using $http service to manage requests. The MaterializeCSS framework provides modern, beautiful interface. By separating server, client and database layer, the business logic can be separated from presentation. This allows me to extend applications or build mobile application in the future.

projects.title: BookmarkEd Android App
projects.description: Buyer and Seller community for buying and selling textbooks. Team project of four. I was responsible for functional development and some UI components

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: Memory Game is fun pairing game in which the goal is to find the matching pair of images. The project was built with Javascript, Jquery to interact with Youtube V3 and TheMovieDB APIs.

projects.title: Hangman
projects.description: Classic yet fun hangman game, guess a country or a movie actor

projects.title: Pain Free Move Well Chiropractic
projects.description: Desktop and mobile responsive website for chropractic therapy based in Lynnwood, Washington.

projects.title: PHP-Database CMS
projects.description: Content Management System using Object oriented PHP using PDO to connect to SQLite. Login with username(admin) and password(pass) to test the demo.

projects.description: HTML5 localstorage, CSS3, jQuery, jQuery Mobile
